main event: A bright white light resembling a comet was observed at Hickam AFB, Hawaii on July 1, 1960.
interesting points: The light increased in size by 7 to 8 times before suddenly disappearing,The object was silent during the observation,The sighting lasted for 3 minutes and was recorded by military personnel,The object was described as having a tail and was bluish-white in color,The description of the sighting is typical of a meteor.
sighted object: a bright white light with a tail
witness description: Colonel Leonard J. Parson and Lieutenant Colonel Richard D. Riddle, reliable observers
